Sentece: The kinetics of 1,2-propanediol (PD) metabolism in vivo have been determined by employing the Michaelis-Menten rate equation; it was found that maximum metabolizing capacity was 8.33 mmole PD/kg/hr in the rat, which is equivalent to 1.06 kg/day for an average 70-kg human.
